gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition

Class ArgumentRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition.ArgumentRule

  • public class ArgumentRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rule that is used to identify the argument of a Predicate. A rule consists of an embedding type, category, and resulting argument type. It can have exceptions or it can be limited to certain lemmas or semantic classes.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

        depType - the embedding type
        category - the lemma category
        argType - the resulting argument type

      • ArgumentRule

        public ArgumentRule(java.lang.String depType,
                    java.lang.String category,
                    java.lang.String argType,
                    java.util.Set<Lexeme> exceptions,
                    java.util.Set<Lexeme> specificTo,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> exceptionClass,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> specificClass)
        Creates a new ArgumentRule with exceptions and specificities.
        Parameters:
        depType - the embedding type
        category - the lemma category
        argType - the resulting argument type
        exceptions - the lemmas that are exceptions to the rule
        specificTo - the lemmas the rule is specific to
        exceptionClass - the semantic classes that are exceptions to the rule
        specificClass - the semantic classes that the rule is specific to

      • filterByCategory

        public static java.util.List<ArgumentRule> filterByCategory(java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules,
                                                            java.lang.String category)
        Filters a list of ArgumentRule objects by category. A prefix match is performed.
        Parameters:
        rules - the list of rules
        category - the category
        Returns:
        the list of rules applying to the category

      • findMatchingArgumentRule

        public static ArgumentRule findMatchingArgumentRule(java.util.List<ArgumentRule> rules,
                                                    java.lang.String embedType,
                                                    Lexeme lex,
                                                    java.lang.String cat,
                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> embeddingTypes)
        Finds an appropriate ArgumentRule from a list of such rules that applies to a given embedding type, lemma, and category.
        Parameters:
        rules - the list of rules
        embedType - the embedding type of the rules to filter with
        lex - the lemma
        cat - the category
        embeddingTypes - the embedding categories from a dictionary definition to filter with
        Returns:
        the rule with embedType embedding type applying to lex lemma, null if such a rule cannot be found
